person.persName: Sandy Alexander Gossom (Warren County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Gossom and Elizabeth Buckley Gossom. Married to Elizabeth "Eliza" Jane Mitchell Gossom in Warren County, Kentucky, on July 11, 1833. Father of Charles Alexander Gossom, Edmund Hall Gossom, Martin Rumsey Gossom, Thomas Gossom, William Gill Gossom, Thomas James Gossom, Ann Elizabeth "Belle" Gossom, Sandy Cooke Gossom, and Tandy Merritt Gossom. Resident in Warren County in 1840. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Warren County in 1840. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Owned eleven enslaved persons in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Owned forty-nine enslaved persons in Warren County in 1860.
